channel.title: [PI]How Can Make It So You Can't Attack A Player With The Same Cape[PI]
channel.description: Please Help Me look I added this awsome clan wars and i want it so you can't attack your team all i need please [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/73852690/My%20Rule.png[/img]

item.title: [PI]How Can Make It So You Can't Attack A Player With The Same Cape[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:19, topic:461697”][quote author=manny458 link=topic=564648.msg4109849#msg4109849 date=1348422523]

Can yah gimme a example of the code this what i put and it don’t work

if(c.wearingTeamCape(i)){
c.sendMessage(“You cant attack player in same team”);
return;
}
[/quote][/quote]
It would be ridiculously simple to add if(c.isInClanWars == true) to only add the cape-kill restrictions during a clanwars match.

Read full topic

Replace the line giving the error with the code above.

That would apply for every cape.

Read his topic title. He asked how to make it so that you can’t attack a player with the same cape.
[/quote]

read more then just the tittle and you see he is trying to do it with only team capes[/quote]

I think you’ll find that the word “cape” is only mentioned in the title, not in the message body.

item.title: [PI]How Can Make It So You Can't Attack A Player With The Same Cape[PI]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:11, topic:461697”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=564648.msg4109917#msg4109917 date=1348425113]

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1) && (c2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1) { sendMessage("You can't attack a player with the same cape!"); resetAttack(); }
[/quote]

thanks for the help i am guessing

1 is the cape id?[/quote]

It is, will be need to be changed of course because id 1 isn’t a cape.

It might need tweaking slightly manny but I think I know the issue, pm me your tv details.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How Can Make It So You Can't Attack A Player With The Same Cape[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

I can try but like I said previously I don’t know the attack player method. But using common java sense if you add an int to each different cape then where the attack method is you tell it NOT to attack the same ints. it should work.

Another way to do this is look at castle wars. Every PI base should have a Castle Wars.java it just isn’t in processes to enable it.

Read full topic

I don’t do TV.

First thing you have to do is define what TeamCape is. and if TeamCape is used in another place you have to Import that file so the .java file knows where to look[/quote]

Ok If i provide the info of capes and stuff can yah help me create the codes for it?

[quote=“Taharahora, post:4, topic:461697”]you have to do it by itemid
unless you make a int [] first to call what TeamCape means and then you can do it that way.

with the item id it looks like this

	if (c.wearId == ####) {
		c.OnSameTeam = true;

(onsameteam doesn’t exists, itll need to be added to player.java[/quote]

My guess is make an int for people wearing the cape and if the int is called off incombat.java have it so they cant attack eachother…[/quote]

if(c.wearingTeamCape(i)){
c.sendMessage(“You cant attack player in same team”);

item.title: [PI]How Can Make It So You Can't Attack A Player With The Same Cape[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

I don’t know exactly but it probable is handled in wearitem.java (i’d google "how to fix wearitem.java using connectionhandler.java, before messing with it.) and also combat.java. Sorry i can’t be more help.

My guess is make an int for people wearing the cape in wearitem.java and if the int is called off, in combat.java have it so they cant attack each other…

I don’t know the methods for attacking a player but if you zfilesearch attackplayer or the likes itll come up
